[Home](./index.md) &gt; [@genesislcap/foundation-shell](./foundation-shell.md) &gt; [AppRoute](./foundation-shell.approute.md)

## AppRoute type

**Signature:**

```typescript
export type AppRoute = FoundationRoute & HasElement & HasPredicate;
```
**References:** [HasPredicate](./foundation-shell.haspredicate.md)

## Example 1

AppRoute definition example.

```ts
export const reporting: AppRoute = {
  title: 'Reporting',
  path: 'reporting',
  name: 'reporting',
  element: async () => (await import('@genesislcap/pbc-reporting')).Reporting,
  navItems: [
    {
      navId: 'header',
      title: 'Reporting',
      icon: {
        name: 'file-csv',
        variant: 'solid',
      },
      placementIndex: 15,
    },
  ],
};
```

## Example 2

Optional runtime [AssetPredicate](./foundation-shell.assetpredicate.md) function to determine if the asset should be used.

```ts
export const reportingAdmin: AppRoute = {
  path: 'reporting-admin',
  predicate: (context: AppContext) => context.user.isAdmin(),
  ...
}
```
